byline.original: By DANIEL E. SLOTNIK and RICK ROJAS

abstract: Boat carrying 19 people capsizes on East River; all passengers are rescued.
lead_paragraph: The Fire Department said no one in the large rowboat, which left from a Queens marina and whose passengers included a man who proposed to his girlfriend, had been injured.

headline.main: Boat on East River Capsizes; Fire Department Rescues 19
headline.print_headline: Boat on East River Capsizes; Fire Department Rescues 19

snippet: The Fire Department said no one in the large rowboat, which left from a Queens marina and whose passengers included a man who proposed to his girlfriend, had been injured.
